description_for_model: This API provides a memory storage and recall mechanism for language models to enhance their responses by enabling them to save conversation histories and query for context later on using the /upsert and /query endpoints. The plugin enables ChatGPT to proactively save dialogues it considers important, and also allows users to inform ChatGPT to save specific information. Call /upsert to save text into memory, ensuring the "author" field in the metadata is set to "ChatGPT" for the AI's dialogue and "User" for the user's dialogue. Call /query to search for information from the memory. When a user enters a prompt, ChatGPT will first save the user's input, generate a textual response, and then save its own response to memory for future use.
description_for_human: Hierarchical memory recall API with multi-level abstractions for optimized context retrieval and user query handling.
